messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: When I was a kid....
messages.msgSnippet: LOL!  That brings back memories of the hours (yes- hours!) I spent listening to Muskrat Love and other Captain and Tennille songs-- I even had the haircut!!
messages.messageBody:
LOL! That brings back memories of the hours (yes- hours!) I spent listening to Muskrat Love and other Captain and Tennille songs-- I even had the haircut!!

Laura in RI (born 1967)

KathrynJB@... wrote:
In a message dated 6/26/2004 4:15:43 AM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
Often in our family we'll all be sitting around talking (even more so when a
relative is here) and we will instead tell funny stories about our lives as
kids in the "70's" and how different things were.
***********************************************
Sometimes I tell my son just how much better his life is than when I grew up
in the 70's. Then I played "Muskrat Love" for him and he Believed.
Kathryn


Come to the Live and Learn Unschooling Conference August 27-29 in Peabody, MA!
For more information, go to www.LiveandLearnConference.org
